post:
Infinite Technologies is a leader in providing businesses with innovative technical solutions. Our exceptional services are equaled only by our continued focus on outstanding quality and support; our friendly staff is available 24/7 to assist you with any issue that may arise. Our servers are housed in the EvoSwitch data-center in Haarlem, The Netherlands.


 Your VPS includes the following value added services:
• Fully managed technical support service*
• 1 GB remote FTP space available on-demand^
• Control Panel for VPS Administration (reboot, reinstall, etc)
• Reverse DNS entries for allocated IPs
• Choice of OS (CentOS, Debian, Fedora Core, SuSE Linux)
• Choice of control panel: cPanel, DirectAdmin or Webmin
• IRC, gameservers, streams, web proxy, vpn (tun / tap) and legal adult content
• No long-term contract (month to month), quarterly, semi-annual and annually available


 VPS Starter [ORDER] - €9.99 per month!
 • 1 Xeon Core 2.0 GHz/core | 20 GB Space | 200 GB Data-Transfer | 512 MB RAM

VPS Plan 1 [ORDER] - €19.99 per month!
 • 2 Xeon Core 2.0 GHz/core | 50 GB Space | 600 GB Data-Transfer | 1024 MB RAM

VPS Plan 2 [ORDER] - €34.99 per month!
 • 2 Xeon Core 2.0 GHz/core | 50 GB Space | 800 GB Data-Transfer | 1536 MB RAM

VPS Plan 3 [ORDER] - €49.99 per month!
 • 4 Xeon Core 2.0 GHz/core | 50 GB Space | 1000 GB Data-Transfer | 2048 MB RAM (2 GB!)

Common features on most plans:
• NO setup fee or one time fee.
• 10/100 Mbps Premium Bandwidth
• 2 Clean IP Addresses
• Free DirectAdmin Panel for Website, Database & Email Management (2/3)
• Any Linux OS of choice
• Full root access

For fine-print and further details, please visit: http://www.infinitetech.eu/HostingServices/VirtualServers/

If you any questions, please email sales@infinitetech.eu



* = Best effort basis. ^ = Available only to users/visitors of this forum on-demand. Infinite Technologies offers managed virtual servers, managed dedicated servers and managed web hosting solutions.
